title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, exposing sync/async APIs and chat interfaces.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, chat, and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now Open-WebUI) with chat history, model switching, and RAG support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama providing synchronous/asynchronous APIs and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating Ollama models into Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with ergonomic commands and config files.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code completion via Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes showing how to combine Ollama with vector DBs, agents, and fine-tuning scripts.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and autoscaling support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) published to Docker Hub for quick local or cloud deployment.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG template using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for private document Q&A.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app demonstrating streaming completions from Ollama via the JS client.
